column4: maybe mdm can't solve all your problems, but he's being kind enough to try to help ppl here
i was trying to be polite when saying the comment wasnt helpful, it wasnt i appreciate the effort but what i really need as i said is to know where to go to find what i need to know
i understood it the first time u said it. i'm just saying you don need to criticize his statements. if it dont help, let it be. i just dont wanna see these helpful pl be discouraged
*nods* noted, i wasnt trying to be discouraging. i will think more on such statements before syaing them in the future
thanks for being mature about it. i'm sorry for being bitchy at you
